com.mappedin.sdk.components.slidingpanel

Class DirectionsSlidePagerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • FragmentStatePagerAdapter
      • com.mappedin.sdk.components.slidingpanel.DirectionsSlidePagerAdapter

  • public class DirectionsSlidePagerAdapter
extends FragmentStatePagerAdapter
    A simple pager adapter that represents a set of ScreenSlidePageFragment objects, in sequence.
